title: XRP whales cap selling as wallet growth hits 8-month high
summary: XRP saw record wallet growth and easing whale outflows, hinting at a potential market bottom despite the recent price weakness.

title: Web3 gaming, DeFi lead sector activity in October despite market decline: Report
summary: Despite a dip in active wallets and DeFi losses, blockchain gaming and decentralized finance continued to drive most Web3 activity last month.

title: JPMorgan says BTC looks cheap next to gold, points to $170K fair value
summary: Analysts at financial services giant JPMorgan forecast “significant upside” for Bitcoin over the next months in a report on Wednesday.

title: Cathie Wood drops BTC forecast by $300K, says stablecoins eroding market share
summary: Stablecoins have emerged as a store-of-value asset in emerging market economies at a rate no one predicted, Wood said on Thursday.

summary: The update brings real-time forecasting data from Kalshi and Polymarket to Google Finance, as more major platforms move into the growing prediction markets space.

title: Circle weighs in on GENIUS Act implementation: ‘Simple, strong rules’

title: Bitcoin bulls retreat as spot BTC ETF outflows deepen and macro fears grow
summary: Bitcoin’s slide toward $100,000 accelerates as ETF outflows, weak earnings and macro uncertainty rattle traders, leaving bulls hesitant to reenter the market.

title: Ray Dalio warns Fed is stimulating the economy into a bubble
summary: Current fiscal and monetary policies will cause hard asset prices to rise, but both are signs of late-stage economic decay, Dalio said.
